column2: an A.M. Eatery////So the big question - would I come back? I'm not all that sure. It was a good experience with good food
column3: but I'm not sure the wait is worth it. It's definitely not worth it on the weekends
column4: and I'm sure this place gets packed during lunch. I think the sweet spot is 9-10 am on weekdays
column5: and unfortunately I'll probably be working.
